name: Vessel of the Destruction, Khaslana
description: Phainon, NeiKos<unbreak>496</unbreak>, Deliverer, Khaslana, The Nameless Hero. Through times longer than chronicles could tell, he fought against the hatred and rage in his heart, until his body withered away. All to await this destined moment, when another Deliverer would extinguish the night's fire and bring forth a new dawn.

skills.name: Destined Casket
skills.description: Khaslana will not strike at heroes who are unwavering in their resolve. He has wrestled with destiny for eons, burned away his very being, and now stands empty, save for the hope he entrusts to you.
